content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?>  <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:opensearch="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:mozilla="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">  <ShortName>refbase (NOAA-ARL)</ShortName>  <LongName>NOAA Air Resources Laboratory Publication Database</LongName>  <Description>NOAA Air Resources Laboratory Publication Database: Search the main fields of the database. This literature database is maintained by the NOAA Air Resources Laboratory (NOAA-ARL).</Description>  <Tags>science academic literature scientific references publication search citation web bibliography database mysql php refbase</Tags>  <Contact>arl.it@noaa.gov</Contact>  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <Language>*</Language>  <InputEncoding>ISO-8859-1</InputEncoding>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>  <Developer>Web Reference Database (http://refbase.sourceforge.net)</Developer>  <Query role="example" title="Sample search" searchTerms="Miller" startIndex="1" count="5" />  <Image type="image/x-icon" height="16" width="16">http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/img/favicon.ico</Image>  <Image type="image/png" height="64" width="64">http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/img/logo_small.png</Image>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=atom" indexOffset="1" />  <Url type="application/rss+xml" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=rss" indexOffset="1" />  <Url type="application/xml" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=srw_dc" indexOffset="1" />  <Url type="application/xml" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=srw_mods" indexOffset="1" />  <Url type="text/html" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=html" indexOffset="1" />  <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" template="http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/opensearch.php?query={searchTerms}&startRecord={startIndex?}&maximumRecords={count?}&recordSchema=json&operation=suggest&client=sug-refbase_suggest-1.0" indexOffset="1" />  <mozilla:SearchForm>http://refbase.arl.noaa.gov/</mozilla:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
